title: Is it worth getting the first edition?
body: i really want star guardian ahri but it feels special if i have the first edition. Do people even notice that some people have the first edition? or does it have any extra value?

replies.body:
Definately worth!!

Enemy team will see your swaggy skin and insta win :D

glhf on the rift tell me how it goes!

In my honest opinion, neither is 'worth it'. Your spending 20 bucks on an artificial skin in a video game.

BUT... if your so keen to get the new Ahri (which I will admit is damn fine) and your going to throw money at Riot, you may aswell throw a little more at them to get the first edition because it will definitely be worth it if you play Ahri a lot.

Well as it is limited time and the border looks absolutely sick, I think it'll have a value increase. It's a legacy border and also includes a a cute icon. So in corn-glue-shun, I'm going have to say a worth it.
